Kefalonia, also known as Cephalonia, is one of the largest and most beautiful of the Ionian Islands located in western Greece. The island’s culture and history date back thousands of years, and Kefalonia remains a fascinating destination for tourists eager to explore ancient archaeological sites, charming villages, and modern wineries. The island’s natural landscape is equally as enchanting, featuring stunning beaches, crystal-clear waters, and dramatic mountain ranges.
